/allagath irakaye sithu sithu lesa ada batahira samagam thel nidhi kaninne yam seda mudagath uthuru nagenahira ada nidahase pragdhanaya gala yayi.aanduwa ema "mudagath" pradeshawala bisnas kirima sadaha mulapura thibe.manushikawa madihathwi thrasthawadaya chappa karana atharathura bisnas sadaha awasthawa padaganima nam wu manthraya wisin adhirajyawadayath sinhala jathikawadayath athara uthsawakari wiwahayak janitha kota thibe./
